ej,peret001,M,danlk901,Call at 3B (reversed) $Charles Johnson ran Todd Zeile back to 3B, both Zeile and Rey Ordonez were on bag when they were tagged; Marlins Manager Tony Perez ejected by 3B umpire Kerwin Danley; umpires originally called both out, then ruled that Zeile could return to 3B; Perez was ejected for arguing the reversal
right on line, catcher let drop, no play

ej,ventr001,P,hirsm901,Called third strike Robin Ventura ejected by HP umpire Mark Hirschbeck
the ball got away and rolled into foul territory down the line

Giles broke off 2nd, caught in rundown, went back to 2B; meanwhile, Ramirez moved to 2B and was tagged out by Ventura while standing on the bag; Giles then wandered off bag and was tagged for DP even though the umpire clearly pointed at Ramirez for the out
